content.raw: @scpeters Looks kinematically correct from where I'm sitting. The resulting .sdf seems to have the correct total mass.  Lots of work to be done yet to verify whether or not the CoM and inertia estimates are an improvement on the real robot but at first hat it looks better. We're in the process of testing on the real robot at IHMC right now.
content.html: @scpeters Looks kinematically correct from where I'm sitting. The resulting .sdf seems to have the correct total mass. Lots of work to be done yet to verify whether or not the CoM and inertia estimates are an improvement on the real robot but at first hat it looks better. We're in the process of testing on the real robot at IHMC right now.
